msg: Incremented version number to reflect 0.28.1 release

author: pll
msg: Updated to note that there are no changes, this is just a rebuild.

author: clkao
msg: Wrap more fs functions as object methods in Perl and misc improvement.
This can't be done with SVN::Base like in other namespaces due to the
function naming is not of some convention.
(svn_root_t): Add all functions taking svn_root_t * as methods.
* perl/t/2fs.t: Update test suite to reflect new method calls.

author: kfogel
